T02D2012:220a-1: badzra shr'i bhee ra ba n'a ma stu ti //
T02D2012:220a-3: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa /
T02D2012:220a-4: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2012:220a-5: aa la la ho 'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
T02D2012:220a-6: rngam byed rgyal po 'jigs pa'i rol thabs can //
T02D2012:220a-7: dur khrod gnas na rol sku'i cha lugs ldan //
T02D2012:220a-8: tshangs chen khyab mjug gzhon nu lha tshogs dang //
T02D2012:220a-9: dbang phyug thags bzangs ris rnams ma lus zhal du gso //
T02D2012:220a-10: khros mdzad rngam khro ru lu ru lu ste //
T02D2012:220a-11: thod pa dbu mar khrag bcas zhal du gsol //
T02D2012:220a-12: che phran mang po'i zar bus mgrin zhugs brgyan //
T02D2012:220a-13: glang po che yi pags pa'i na bza' can //
T02D2012:220b-0: zhal dgu khros gtsigs 'jam @220b dpal chos kyi sku //
T02D2012:220b-1: ma he'i zhal 'dzin byol song skrag mdzad cing //
T02D2012:220b-2: rva mdog aindra n'i la'i 'od 'phro zhing //
T02D2012:220b-3: h'um dang chem dang sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs //
T02D2012:220b-4: zhal nas ljags 'dril he he he he dz'a //
T02D2012:220b-5: ston ka'i char sprin gzhon nu 'jigs pa'i zhal //
T02D2012:220b-6: nam mkha'i a'anytsa'i mdog 'dra sngon por snang //
T02D2012:220b-7: pad dang padma r'a ga'i mdog 'dra gnyis //
T02D2012:220b-8: gser bsrags [?] dang mtshungs che ba'i yon tan ldan //
T02D2012:220b-9: shel dang dung 'dra zla ba zhi ba'i tshul //
T02D2012:220b-10: sre ya ka ltar dung kha rab tu drag / dgu pa bzhin khros byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D2012:220b-11: thod pa lnga bcu se ral khar bsnams pa //
T02D2012:220b-12: rkang tshil khrag dang zhag bcas glo snying gsol //
T02D2012:220b-13: sri ka dushd'a na h'um na ma ra na /
T02D2012:220b-14: sh'irt'am pushta ma h'a ma ra dza /
T02D2012:220b-15: las rnams ma lus rdzogs pa mthar phyin pas //
T02D2012:220b-16: sems can khams rnams ma lus kun don mdzod //
T02D2012:220b-17: gri gug la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i mtshan mar ldan //
T02D2012:220b-18: dbu mgo chen po'i tshogs ni gyen du sgreng //
T02D2012:220b-19: yan lag rags pa'i lto ni thur du bshal //
T02D2012:220b-20: dz'a dz'a ki ki h'um h'um ha la ha /
T02D2012:220b-21: ha ha ya ya ma ma ra ra zhes /
T02D2012:220b-22: tsa tsha las rnams ma lus kun mdzad pa //
T02D2012:220b-23: slob dpon skur dang de yi dkor khyed dang //
T02D2012:220b-24: kun la gnod byed dam bskur ba dang //
T02D2012:220b-25: dam tshig dag la mi gnas sgrol bar byed //
T02D2012:220b-26: rdo rje thod dbyig 'jigs pa'i sgra dang ldan //
T02D2012:220b-27: mi dang ma he la sogs pa de bzhin bya
T02D2012:220b-28: rog 'ug / bya rgod zhabs kyis gnon pa'i sku
T02D2012:220b-29: tsa ra bzhugs // hal mgrin bzang mar khu chen po gsol //
T02D2012:220b-30: aa shva da la sogs shing dbus dgyes par gsol //
T02D2012:220b-31: spyang ki kang+ga 'bar ba ce spyang dang //
T02D2012:220b-32: bya rog khra dang ma h'a ru lu ni //
T02D2012:220b-33: gdug pa can rnams ma lus sha za ba'i //
T02D2012:220b-34: tshogs kyi phyogs ni de bzhin sprin ltar gtibs //
T02D2012:220b-35: de 'dra'i dbus kyi gzhal yas khang pa na //
T02D2012:220b-36: tshul du bzhugs pas sems can 'gro don mdzad //
T02D2012:220b-37: rol mdzad thugs rjes sprul la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2012:220b-38: gdug pa zhal du gsol la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2012:220b-39: las rnams mthar phyin mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2012:220b-40: khro tshogs 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2012:220b-41: autpala sngo 'dra'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2012:220b-42: nyi ma brgya yi gzi ldan phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2012:221a-0: @221a * // 'ga' zhig mtshan ni 'dzin zhing bstod pa dang //
T02D2012:221a-1: de yi yon tan phyogs tsam bzung nas kyang //
T02D2012:221a-2: yid la gnas kyi gzhan du mi smra na //
T02D2012:221a-3: dngos grub ster zhing las rnams ma lus 'gugs //
T02D2012:221a-4: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa /
